review: Beautiful app, but some issues. I wish I could delete intake if I accidentally press it. I wish I could customize the goal to whatever I want (80oz instead of 78oz). I also think it would be better if the water graphic rose with the amount you've had. I find the visual motivating. I really want to keep this app but will probably delete.
Please add sync option, so that we can get the data after reinstall and phone reset. And Pop-up Reminder also which is very helpful than notification.
Fantastic, beatiful, and thrilling, This is most interesting remind application I have ever used.
Love this app. The best drinking water tracker after compared few similar apps.
